message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 8-1-2, translated into en
data: This indicator reflects the growth in terms of the final volume of goods and services of the economy generated in a certain period of quarter, 6 months, 9 months and whole year. The growth rate of gross domestic product is calculated for industries, groups of industries, economic types and territories, in order to assess the rhythm of economic development of the whole country, an industry or a territory.
